chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Set
X: Set
icomp: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
ilen: X -> nat
Hilen: forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x
state_Y: Type
state_X: Type
step_X: X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop
step_Y: Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop
step_X_tot: forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2
step_Y_fun: forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y/ st -1> st2 -> st1 = st2
simul: state_X -> state_Y -> Prop
Hicomp: instruction_compiler_sound
linker: nat -> nat
P: (nat * list X)%type
Q: (nat * list Y)%type
HPQ: forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i
i1: nat
v1: state_X
w1: state_Y

Goal:
v1 ⋈ w1 -> Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) ↓ -> P /X/ (i1, v1) ↓

Premises:

compiler_complete_step : forall (p : nat) (st1 : nat * state_X) (w1 w3 : nat * state_Y), snd st1 ⋈ snd w1 -> linker (fst st1) = fst w1 -> in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst w3) Q -> Q /Y/ w1 -[ p ] -> w3 -> exists (q : nat) (st2 : nat * state_X) (w2 : nat * state_Y), snd st2 ⋈ snd w2 /\ linker (fst st2) = fst w2 /\ P /X/ st1 -> > st2 /\ Q /Y/ w2 -[ q ] -> w3 /\ q < p
compiler_subcode : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat) (x : X), (j, x :: nil) <sc P -> (compiler.linker lc P i err j, c (compiler.linker lc P i err) j x) <sc (i, compiler c lc P i err) /\ compiler.linker lc P i err (1 + j) = lc x + compiler.linker lc P i err j
compiler_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), length (compiler c lc P i err) = length_compiler lc (snd P)
linker_in_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), (forall x : X, 1 <= lc x) -> forall j : nat, in_code j P -> in_code (compiler.linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
linker_out_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat), err < i \/ length_compiler lc (snd P) + i <= err -> out_code j P -> out_code (compiler.linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
compiler_sound : forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) -> > (i2, v2) -> exists w2 : state_Y, v2 ⋈ w2 /\ Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) -> > (linker i2, w2)
sss_compute_max_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (R : nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, sss_step_stall one_step P st -> R st st) -> (forall st1 st3 : nat * data, (forall (Q : code instr) (st2 : nat * data), Q <sc P -> sss_progress one_step Q st1 st2 -> sss_compute_max one_step P st2 st3 -> R st2 st3) -> R st1 st3) -> forall st1 st3 : nat * data, sss_compute_max one_step P st1 st3 -> R st1 st3
subcode_sss_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_steps one_step P p st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, k = p + q /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3
comp_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat), length (comp c lc lnk i ll j) = length_compiler lc ll
sss_terminates_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (R : nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, out_code (fst st) P -> R st) -> (forall st1 : nat * data, (forall (Q : code instr) (st2 : nat * data), Q <sc P -> sss_progress one_step Q st1 st2 -> sss_terminates one_step P st2 -> R st2) -> R st1) -> forall st : nat * data, sss_terminates one_step P st -> R st
